com.jogamp.opengl.impl.windows.wgl
Class WGL

java.lang.Object
  com.jogamp.opengl.impl.windows.wgl.WGL

public class WGL
extends Object

Provides access to the Windows-specific OpenGL vendor extensions. See GLBase for more information.
